message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work out a better deal in the future, I hope.
Your offer was quite lopsided, Alice. I'm proposing a more equitable split this time. Let's be reasonable and avoid letting the money dwindle away.
I think 50/50 is a fair and reasonable split, given the shrinking value of the money. Let's avoid further losses and call it a day.
